content: The following steps might be helpful: "Settings" > "Accounts" section > tap the account you want to delete > tap three vertical dots on the top right corner > "Remove account".
creator: Yu5tiqX9og

content: Thank you. On my phone I had to double tap on the account name, then the settings options with the three dots came up. The process probably varies with each kind of phone, I don't know but I wouldn't have gotten it if I didn't try the double tap! thanks again
creator: knitsewdream
